Interface QueryScope

BasicQueryScope
public interface QueryScope

Holds the scope information supplied with the element.

getExcluded

public java.util.Set getExcluded()
Returns an Iterator for Scope objects, that shall be excluded from SEARCH. An excludedScope must match the scope of a store as defined in Domain.xml

Returns:
an Iterator of Scope objects
